Reflection is a WordPress plugin applies reflection effect to images with 'reflection' as one of the HTML attribute class values.

==FAQ==
  * Q: My blog doesn't have white background and the reflection looks out of place.
    A: Create your own header image (file name must be header.jpg) with the exact dimension 500 pixels in width and 265 pixels in height. Replace the original header file wp-content/themes/emptiness/header.jpg with your own header.jpg .

==Types==
  * Default reflection
  * Gradient reflection with percentage reflection height
  * Gradient reflection with fixed pixels height
